College_Summary: Baruipur College was established in 1981, it is affiliated with the University of Calcutta. The college is located in Baruipur, South 24 Parganas, West Bengal. The college is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC). The college offers BA, B.Sc, and B.Com courses with both general and honors subjects. The college has been accredited with a ‘C+’ grade by the NAAC. Admission to the college is done through merit scored in the previous qualifying examination.

Basanti Devi College is the first government aided college in Kolkata which was founded by the Government of West Bengal in 1959. The institute offers profuse B.A. & B.Sc. (Hons. & General) courses at UG level and M.A. in English as well as M.A. in Political Science at PG level. The college also offers a Diploma course in Export-Import Management and certificate course in English Language Training. Basanti Devi College is reaccredited B+ by NAAC and affiliated to the University of Calcutta. The admissions at Basanti Devi College are sought through the merit of marks secured in the qualifying exam for all UG courses as well as M.A. in Political Science whereas candidates opting for M.A. in English need to go through English Entrance Exam conducted by the college itself.

Basirhat College has started its journey on 16th November, 1947. The college was affiliated to the University of Calcutta but with the formation of West Bengal State University in 2008, it is now affiliated to this new University. The institution has accommodated a huge number of students, coming from villages and towns to obtain their bachelor degree in Arts, Science and Commerce. The prime motive of college is to provide higher education and create a society where the educated youth will be pioneers in its struggle against ignorance, illiteracy and other social evils. The college has celebrated its Golden Jubilee in 1996.

Behala College, Kolkata is an art and science college established in the year 1963.  It is affiliated to the University of Calcutta. The college has re-accredited with ‘A’ grade by NAAC and is recognized by UGC. Presently, the college is running General and Honors programs in Science and Humanities disciplines at the UG & PG level. It has excellent facilities for a better learning environment of students.

Bejoy Narayan Mahavidyalaya, popularly known as Itachuna College, is the one and only private college in Itachuna. Established in 1950, Bejoy Narayan Mahavidyalaya is affiliated with the University of Burdwan and is located in the district of Hooghly, West Bengal, India. At present, the college offers honors and other general programs in the faculties of Arts and Science along with 13 awards each year.

Belda College, located at Belda, Paschim Medinipur was established in the year 1963. It is affiliated to Vidyasagar University and is recognized by UGC. NAAC accredited this college with ‘B’ grade. Presently, it is running BA, B.Com. B.Sc., B.Voc., BCA at the UG level and MA, M.Sc. at the PG level under highly qualified faculties. The college has outstanding facilities to provide the students with a pleasant atmosphere of learning.

Berhampore Girl's College is a women's college in Berhampore, in Gora Bazar Area of Murshidabad district, in the state of West Bengal in India. Berhampore Girls' College was established in 1946. It is the first government sponsored college in the state of West Bengal. It is affiliated to the University of Kalyani.

Bethuadahari College is a general degree college founded in 1986, in Nadia district of West Bengal. It was initially affiliated to the University of Calcutta, then later to the University of Kalyani. The college has received affiliation from UGC and is accredited by NAAC. Presently, it is running Undergraduate courses in the field of Arts and Commerce. In addition, the college offers an MA program through distance education.

Established in 1968, Bhairab Ganguly College is one of the top graduate schools in West Bengal. It offers higher education in Humanities, Commerce, and Basic Sciences. Courses offered include B.A, B.Sc, and B.Com as undergraduate programs, and M.A, M.Sc and M.Com as postgraduate courses. Admissions to all courses are merit-based. Applications are only accepted online. The application form sent in any other mode will be rejected.

Courses_Details.Course Rating:

          out of 173
          by

Rated #152

        India Today in Arts

College_Summary: Bhangar Mahavidyalay is a degree college which was in 1996. The college got affiliated to the University of Calcutta. The college is recognized by UGC under 2f and 12B

Bidhan Chandra College Rishra, West Bengal established in 1957. The college offers 6 courses namely BA, MA, BSc, and B.Com (both general and Hons). Bidhan Chandra College also offers add-on courses in Yoga and Music. Admission to the courses is generally merit-based. Applicants are required to apply online for the admission process and submit all the important documents as well. The minimum eligibility for all the courses is 50% aggregate marks in the last qualifying examination.

Bidhannagar College, established in 1984, is accredited from NAAC and it is affiliated to the University of Calcutta. The college offers 19 courses across 4 streams namely Arts, Education, Science, and across 4 degrees like BSc, BA, MSc. & M.A. Apart from undergraduate courses, the college offers postgraduate courses in Anthropology, Botany, Chemistry, Education, Microbiology and Zoology. Admission to the college is done on the basis of marks secured in the previous qualifying examination and the entrance test conducted by the college.

Bijoy Krishna Girls College (BKGC), Howrah was established in the year 1947 with the mission of empowering girls through the expansion of knowledge. It is affiliated to the University of Calcutta. It has the approval of NCTE and achieved CPE status by UGC. Presently, it is running BA, B.Sc., and B.Com. at the UG level and MA, M.Sc.,M.Com. at the PG level. The college also offers a teacher’s training program B.Ed. for students. It has a consistent record of excellent academic results with rank holders in University exams

Birpara College, Alipurduar West Bengal was set up in the year 1986 as Public Educational Institute to give advanced education to build vocation in the field of Humanities and Commerce. The school offers undergraduate courses in the field of Arts and Commerce. The popular courses offered by this college are BA and B.Com (General and Honors both). The mode of application is online. The admission is based on merit.

Brahmananda Keshab Chandra College, established in 1956, is an undergraduate college in Kolkata. It was named after the nineteenth century social reformer Keshab Chandra Sen. The college is affiliated to the West Bengal State University and situated on seven acres of land, near the Indian Statistical Institute and at north-west corner of a lake. The College believes in the idea that education does not consist in mere learning, but involves fostering a sense of social responsibility among its students, the future pioneers of social change.

Established in 1971, Budge Budge College is one of the oldest and premier colleges under the university of calcutta. Situated in the small and quaint towns of Budge Budge in West Bengal, the college has established a distinct aura and significance for itself over the years.

Burdwan Raj College, established in 1881, is situated in the heart of West Bengal. The college offers 25 UG courses, and 1 PG course.These include B.A, B.Sc, B.Com, BBA, BCA, and M.A. Admissions to all the courses are solely merit based. Applications are only accepted online. The top recruiters of the institute include LIC, WIPRO, Mahindra Finance, Pest Control of India Ltd, ICICI (Prudential), ABP Group, Gillette, Amul India, and many more.

Chakdaha College was established in 1972 in Chakdaha, Nadia district of West Bengal, India. College is affiliated by the University of Kalyani. It is a well-known university by the University Grant Commission (UGC). This is a public college known for its UG courses in the field of arts, science, and commerce. Apart from normal courses, college also provides Hons. courses. Admissions to first year are strictly merit based through entrance examination. Aspirants will be eligible for admission if they have passed their 10 + 2 examination.

Chanchal College, situated in the Malda district of West Bengal is a public institution of undergraduate education. The college is affiliated to the University of Gour Banga, West Bengal. It offers undergraduate courses in Science, Arts, and Commerce stream for socio-cultural and educational upliftment of tribal and poverty-stricken minority category of students. The college is affiliated to Gaur Banga university and is recognized by the UGC. Admission to the college is done on the basis of merit scored in the previous qualifying examination.

Chandernagore College was established in 1862 by the French colonial government as a primary school; it was re-established in 1931 as one of the oldest institutes in west Bengal district Hooghly. It is affiliated to the University of Burdwan.

Chandrakona Vidyasagar Mahavidyalaya, Medinipur was established in 1985. The College is affiliated by the Vidyasagar University. The College is now running with full swing with the cordial help of the people, university authority U.GC. & Govt. of West Bengal. The mission of the institute is to ensure and sustain quality in all academic and administrative activities, the students from semi-urban and rural areas become confident and self-reliant through education.The college is located in the heart of Chandrakona Town just beside Chandrakona Municipality. Ghatal-Chandrakona road is 200 mtr away from it.

Charuchandra College, Kolkata established in the year 1947, is a 71 years old college situated in the state of West Bengal. It is affiliated to the University of Calcutta. The college offers both Honors and General Undergraduate courses in the field of Science, Arts, and Commerce. Admissions to all the courses are done through online mode only as per the guidelines of the University of Calcutta. The college with its rich academic, sports, and cultural heritage looks forward to giving its students all the opportunities with which they can uplift themselves in their respective chosen careers or field of study.

Chittaranjan College, founded in 1967, is an undergraduate college founded by the Late Ranadeb Choudharyin Kolkata, West Bengal. It offers 2 Undergraduate programs in B.A and B.Com. These include BA General/ BA Honors course in English and Bengali. B.Com General and B.Com Honors in Accounting and Finance. Admissions to all courses are purely based on merit in the qualifying examination. Applications are accepted online. Scholarships and freeships are also provided.

Cooch Behar College is one of the reputed colleges located in Cooch Behar district, West Bengal. The college has been running Arts and Commerce courses with the topic programs of B.A. Honours in Philosophy and B.A. General in History, government, Economics, Bengali and English, and B.Com. Honors and General. The faculty also introduced the B.B.A. course and Science programs with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and Computer specializations. Final selection of the students is based on merits obtained in the previous qualifying examinations and the counseling held by the college. Applicants who look forward to admission at the college are required to apply online through the official website.

Darjeeling College of Engineering, established in 1948, is an Arts, Science, and Commerce college offering a total of 29 courses spread across 3 streams specifically Commerce and Banking, Arts and Science. Under the three streams, the college offers 5 degrees, namely, B.A., B.Sc., B.Com., M.A. and M.Sc. Admission to bachelor’s and master’s courses is only based on merit and availability of seats. The application process of the college is online and the applicants must fill the application form on the official website along with all the necessary documents.

College_Name: Debra Thana Sahid Kshudiram Smriti Mahavidyalaya, Medinipur
College_Summary: Derozio Memorial College was established in the year 1996 by the combined efforts of the local inhabitants of Rajarhat and the Rajarhat-Gopalpur Municipality. DMC College offers undergraduate courses in all three streams of Arts, Commerce and Science and the admissions are done on the CBCS system. The courses offered include B.Sc, BA, and B.Com (both Hons and General). Applicants looking forward to getting an admission must have obtained 50% aggregate marks in the previous qualifying examination.

Deshbandhu College for Girls was established in 1955. The college is located in Kolkata, West Bengal, and is affiliated with the University of Calcutta. Deshbandhu College for Girls has 13 academic departments and offers Honours and General Degree Courses across Humanities and Commerce streams. Courses such as B.Sc, BA, BBA, B.Com, etc. require 50% aggregate marks in the qualifying examination for admission. Applicants with good academic records are eligible to apply for admission through the official website of the college.

College_Name: Dewan Abdul Gani College - [DAGC], Dakshin Dinajpur

College_Summary: Dakshin Bharat Dhruba Chand Halder College popularly known as Dhruba Chand Halder College (DCH Bengal) is an Arts, Science, and Commerce college offering various programs such as BA, B.Sc, and B.Com (both Hons. and General). The college offers admission to students who achieve 50% aggregate marks in the previous qualifying examinations. Applicants applying for admission can apply online for the admission by filling up the application form and paying the application fee of INR 100.

College_Name: Dr. Bhupendra Nath Dutta Smriti Mahavidyalaya, Bardhaman
Dr Gour Mohan Roy College, Bardhaman
College_Summary: Dr. Kanailal Bhattacharya College is accredited by NAAC with 'B' grade. It offers diverse UG level courses with multiple specializations in the field of Arts, Commerce, and Science. Additionally, the college offers some vocational, diploma, and certification courses as well to enrich students with professional qualities.

Dumkal college was established on September 21, 1999, with the aim of providing Higher Education to the girl minority with easily accessible education. Located in Murshidabad, West Bengal with affiliation to the University of Kalyani. Science, Commerce, and Arts are the popular streams in which Undergraduate, General, and Honors degree courses are offered.

Durgapur Government College is a Government college of higher education established in 1969. It is affiliated to Kazi Nazrul University and has been accredited with ‘A’ grade by NAAC. This college offers both Honors and General Undergraduate courses in the field of Science, Arts, Commerce, and also a Post-graduate course in Science across 3 specializations. Admission is granted on the basis of merit. It offers excellent facilities to the students to create a better atmosphere for learning

Dwijendralal College got established at Nadia in the West Bengal state of India. Established in 1968, it is accredited from NAAC and it is affiliated to the University of Kalyani. Dwijendralal College, Nadia offers different courses across 6 streams namely Commerce and Banking, Arts, Performing Arts, Education, Physical Education, and Management, and across 3 degrees like BA, B.Com., and Certificate. Few campus facilities include Auditorium, Sports, ATM, Computer Lab, Gym, Medical Facilities, Library, Hostel, Classroom, Grounds, and Canteen, etc. are available. It also has decent placement record.

East Calcutta Girls College (ECGC), Kolkata is a college of higher education established in the year 1992. It is affiliated to the West Bengal State University and has been re-accredited ‘B’ grade by NAAC. The college offers B.A., B.Sc., B.Com at the UG level, and MA, M.Sc. at the PG level. It has been successful in creating good placement statistics over the years and offers financial support to the students.

Egra Sarada Shashi Bhusan College located in West Bengal is a public institute established in 1968. It is one of the oldest colleges in Purba Medinipur district which is affiliated to Vidyasagar University, accredited by NAAC, and recognized by UGC . It offers undergraduate courses in arts, commerce and sciences, and postgraduate courses in arts and science. Admission is done solely on merit basis

College_Name: Gandhi Centenary B.T. College, North 24 Parganas
College_Summary: Gangarampur is a co-ed college established in 1981 in Dinajpur District, West Bengal. It is affiliated to the University of Gour Banga. The college offers four degrees in Undergraduate programs.

Garhbeta College was established 1948 under the able leadership of the freedom fighter late Gobinda Kumar Singha. SITS is a Self-financing, Non-Autonomous, recognized by NAAC-B, Govt. Aided and affiliated to Vidyasagar University, Midnapore.The institution presently offers Honours courses in thirteen subjects in Arts, Science and Commerce and Office Management and Secretarial Practice (OMSP) as a vocational subject, Professional course, B.PED.

Gobardanga Hindu College, West Bengal, established in the year 1947 aims to provide education to the common masses of the society. It is affiliated to West Bengal State University and has been accredited with grade ‘A’ by NAAC. UGC has declared it as a 5-star university. The college offers undergraduate programs in the field of Arts, Science and Commerce and also a teacher’s training program. It also has great infrastructure and faculties for providing quality education.

GM or Gour Mahavidyalaya was established in 1985. It offers both general and honors undergraduate courses in science and arts streams like BA and B.Sc. It also offered Self Financed courses and PG courses in distance mode. The admission is done based on merit as per Choice based credit system. The application mode is online.

Gour Mohan Sachin Mandal Mahavidyalaya (GMSMM), established in 1969 is a private college located at Assam. It is affiliated to University of Calcutta and accredited with ‘B’ grade by NAAC. It offers UG programs across various disciplines. The college strives to impart quality and equitable education to many at affordable costs. The admission to this college is purely based on the merit of previously qualified examination. One of the advantages that the institute holds is that it offers a course in the regional language viz. Bengali.

College_Name: Gour Mohan Sachin Mandal Mahavidyalaya - [GMSMM], South 24 Parganas
Government College of Art and Craft - [GCAC], Kolkata
College_Summary: Gyan Jyoti College, West Bengal, Siliguri is an educational centre which concentrates on inculcating in students complete subject knowledge as well as ethical values. The mission is to nurture and develop the student’s overall personality. The college is set up with a motive to spread awareness on the importance of higher studies and how it can help create a better society. With a world class set up in the college, the students have several opportunities to learn, grow and pass out to be efficient professionals and citizens. The Students here are groomed in an efficient manner where the focus is on four main aspects - Communication Skills, Body Language, Positive Attitude and Presentation skills.

Haldia Government College was established in 1988 in Medinipur. With 13 undergraduate and 2 postgraduate programs, the college offers degrees in humanities, social sciences, and sciences. In addition, there are 3 more Postgraduate courses offered under the directorate of distance education and one vocational course. Admissions to all courses are strictly based on merit, and applications are accepted online. Haldia government college offers good placement opportunities to its students.

Haringhata Mahavidyalaya is a state public college established in the year 1986 under the Govt. of West Bengal. It is affiliated to the University of Kalyani and accredited with ‘B’ grade by NAAC. It is a general degree college located in Nadia district of West Bengal. This college provides various Undergraduate courses in the field of Arts, Commerce, and Science. Admission to the courses is done on the basis of marks secured in the last qualifying examination.

Heramba Chandra College, popularly known as South City Day College is situated in Golpark and is one of the leading colleges in South Calcutta. The college is a private institute affiliated to the University of Calcutta and is rated B+ from NAAC.

Hiralal Mazumdar Memorial College for Women, Kolkata, West Bengal was established in the year of 1959. It is affiliated to the West Bengal State University (WBSU) for the Undergraduate courses.It is recognized by the UGC. It offers five UG courses across the 3 streams namely Arts, Science and Commerce.

College_Name: Hiralal Mazumdar Memorial College for Women Dakshineswar

College_Summary: Hooghly Women’s college got established in 1949 in the Hooghly district of West Bengal. It was earlier affiliated to the University of Calcutta until 1962 but later turned its affiliation to the University of Burdwan. It is the sixth academic institution and the first women’s college in the district. It is also the largest Women’s College of Burdwan University. It is a government-sponsored college and is accredited with B++ grade in NAAC. The institute is UGC recognized and consists of various courses in Arts, Science, and Commerce like BA (Hons.), BA (General), B.Sc. (General) and B.Sc. (Hons.) under a number of specializations.

Indian Statistical Institute is a government institute that trains students in statistics and related sciences. ISI has its headquarters in Kolkata with 4 more centres operating in Delhi, Bengaluru, Chennai and Tezpur. ISI was announced as an Institute of National Importance by the Government of India in 1959. The institute is accredited to the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MOSPI) and is recognized by AICTE. It offers full-time UG, PG and Short-term courses including B.Stat, B.Math, M.Stat and MS among others. Additionally, the institute also offers various research fellowships and certification programmes.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Management [PGDM] (Business Analytics)

College_Summary: Jagannath Kishore College, also known as the J K College was established in 1948. At present, the college offers 19 undergraduate and postgraduate courses. The courses offered at the college include BA, B.Sc, B.Com, MA, etc. (both Hons and General). The admission for all streams is strictly based on the merit obtained in the previous qualifying examination. The minimum percentage required for the major courses is 50% marks in all the subjects.

College_Name: Jagannath Kishore College -[J. K. College], Purulia
College_Summary: Jamini Roy College (JRC Bankura) is an affiliation of Bankura University offering Undergraduate courses to students in the fields of Arts. The average annual fee of the college is INR 3,000. Applicants need to apply online for admission along with all the documents required.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Psychological Counseling

College_Name: Jayaprakash Institute of Social Change - [JPISC], Kolkata
College_Summary: Jhargram Raj College is situated at the town of Jhargram, West Bengal It has registered a spectacular growth over the years since its inception. On May 8th , 1999, the college celebrated the completion of 50 years of its glorious existence. The college is affiliated to Vidyasagar University. Various scholarships are also provided by the college.

Jogesh Chandra Chaudhuri College, Kolkata, West Bengal is one of the National Institutions founded in the year 1965. It is a co-educational institution and is affiliated with Calcutta University, Kolkata.

Kaliyaganj College was established in 1968 in Uttar Dinajpur, West Bengal. The college offers general and honors courses in Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Commerce and Bachelor of Science. Admissions to all courses are made on the basis of merit in the 12th standard examination. The application process for admission is online. The applicants must apply through the official website. The minimum eligibility for the selection process is 50% marks in 10+2 in the relevant stream.

Kalna College was established in 1943 in West Bengal. The college provides undergraduate courses in Arts, Science, Commerce, and Teaching. Admissions to the courses are based on merit, eligibility for which requires 50% aggregate marks in 10+2, while the admission for the Bachelor of Education course requires a graduate degree in a relevant stream. The average salary for UG placed students is INR 2.04 LPA, and for PG placed students is INR 3.6 LPA.

Kalyani Mahavidyalaya was established in 1999 in Nadia, West Bengal. The courses offered by the institute include Bachelor of Arts (General and Honours), Bachelor of Commerce (General and Honours), and Bachelor of Science (Honours only). Admissions to all courses are based on merit achieved in the qualifying examination. Applications are accepted online as well as offline.

College_Name: Kandra Radha Kanta Kundu Mahavidyalaya, Bardhaman
College_Summary: Established in 1968 the college is a well known Government College in West Bengal. It is affiliated to University of Kalyani and has been approved by UGC as well as accredited by NAAC. The college offers a number of Undergraduate programmes in the fields of Science, Arts and Commerce.

College_Name: Karimpur Pannadevi College, Nadia, West Bengal
College_Summary: Katwa College is situated in Purba Burdwan District of West Bengal. It was established in 1960 under the affiliation of the University of Burdwan and is one of the oldest colleges in Katwa. Katwa College, Burdwan is a Government aided college that offers only undergraduate courses, i.e, BA, B.Sc, B.Com and B.Ed in different specializations.

The Khalisani Mahavidyalaya is an undergraduate degree college, located in a rural setting, in Hooghly, West Bengal. The college was set up in 1970 and is affiliated to the University of Burdwan. The college offers 22 programs in fifteen different departments in the Arts, Science and Commerce streams3 and follows the conventional annual three-year UG program as well as the newly introduced CBCS semester system simultaneously. The admission to the college is merit based and the application process for the same is online.

Kharagpur College is a private institute located in Medinipur, West Bengal, India. It is affiliated to Vidyasagar University. It offers UG and PG courses in 19 subjects of 3 major streams (Humanities & social sciences, Science and  Accounting &Commerce. There are around 3593 students in the college.

The Khejuri College, Medinipur, West Bengal, built solely from donations both, in cash and in the land, by Educational Institutes, believe that the Institutes sacred duty is to impart quality education to everyone equally. The College wishes to set an example for other institutes that even without outrageous funds, a world class Institute can be built. Khejuri College, Medinipuri endeavors at delivering top notch facilities and education facilities to people from all walks of life. The main objective of the Institute is to make quality education easily available to people which is both technically up to date, and also relevant to the fast growing corporate world.

Established in 2005, Lolgola College was built with an aim to improve higher education for all-round development of the society, especially for those belonging to lower class & middle class. Situated at Lalgola village of Murshidabad in West Bengal, it is recognized by UGC & affiliated to the University of Kalyani. The college currently offers 2 courses, namely B.A. (Hons.) in 7 different specializations as well as B.A. (General) in different subject combinations. Although the campus covers an area of 3.12 acres, the environment here is calm & quiet, pollution-free & also natural beauty adds a star to its surrounding. Admissions at Lalgola College are done solely on merit basis from qualifying exams.

Mahadevananda Mahavidyalaya is a government-aided college established in the year 1968 and also been accredited by the NAAC with ‘A’ Grade. The college is affiliated to West Bengal State University. It provides various undergraduate courses in the streams of Arts, Science, and Commerce. Admission in the college is completely based on merit and is in online mode.

College_Name: Maharajadhiraj Uday Chand Women's College - [MUC], Bardhaman
College_Summary: Maharaja Manindra Chandra College (MMCC), Kolkata is an undergraduate private College offering three undergraduate courses namely, B.A, B.Sc, B.Com in various disciplines like, Bengali, English, History, Journalism and Mass Communication, Philosophy, Political Science, Hindi, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology, Economics, Computer Science and Finance and Accounting.

Maharaja Sris Chandra College, Kolkata, is one of the reputed institutions in the country with good infrastructure, qualified and experienced faculty and practical exposure to students in terms of education and training. The college offers a value-based education. The college strives towards providing need-based education and caters to the students who are suffering from financial constraints. It also moves forward with the intention of developing a sense of independence, career consciousness and self-reliance among the students. The college mainly offers undergraduate studies and provides guidance for future studies.

College_Name: Maharaja Manindra Chandra College, Kolkata, West Bengal
College_Summary: Maheshtala College, established in 1971, is a private institute located in West Bengal, India. It is an undergraduate college, affiliated to the University of Calcutta, UGC approved and NAAC accredited(Grade B+). The institute offers a total of 15 bachelors degree courses in three different streams(Arts, Science and Commerce), out of which 9 are in Arts stream, 5 in Science stream and 1 in Commerce stream.

Mahishadal Raj College is the 3rd oldest government college in Midnapore, Calcutta, and was established in 1946. It provides 35 UG courses and 8 PG courses in Science, Humanities and Commerce streams. The college also offers 11 courses in distance mode and other career-oriented programs as well. Admissions to both UG and PG programs are provided based on merit as well as an entrance exam. The application process happens in both online mode

Malda College, Malda located at West Bengal is a government-aided educational institute, established in the year 1994. The college has been accredited by NAAC with grade B and affiliated to the Gour Banga University and is approved by UGC. The college offers multiple UG and PG courses like BA, BA (Hons.), B.Sc., B.Sc. (Hons.), B.Com., B.Com. (Hons.), BCA, and MA in various disciplines. Admission to the same is purely done based on merit with the aid of marks secured in 10+2 or equivalent exams by the candidates.

Malda Women’s College (MWC) was established in 1970 in the Malda district of West Bengal. The institute has been striving for the academic empowerment of women for many years. It offers both BA  as well as BA Honors courses in a variety of different streams like English, Economics, Education, etc. Admission to these courses is solely on the basis of merit. The institute is also well equipped with all the facilities and teaching faculty required for the efficient training of its students.

Manbhum Maha Vidyalaya was started with a vision to extend the academic knowledge, expand the scope of higher education and all round personality development of its students specifically amongst the backward sections of the district. The college’s establishment was primarily a result of the hard work and responsibility undertaken by the social workers with inspiring ideas. The college aspires to build a platform for cultivating a strong community feeling amongst the students of different communities that results in a bond of love and respect. The mission of Manbhum Mahavidyalaya is to assist students in the pursuit of knowledge and develop their personal values by encouraging them to get actively involved in academic and extracurricular activities.

Established in the year 1969, Mathabhanga College is a primeval and promising education institute, situated in the quaint town of Mathabhanga, in the district of Cooch Behar in West Bengal. Spanning over 10.78 acres of land, the college consists of two buildings, with an in-campus playground and a boys hostel.

Michael Madhusudan Memorial College was established in 1996 in the memory of Michael Madhusudan, a great scholar and literary figure of English Literature. This college is assessed and accredited by NAAC in Cycle 2 with Grade ‘B’ and 2.40 CGPA. It is affiliated to the University of Burdwan. This undergraduate college has a good beginning with the traditional courses in arts and commerce. Admission to the college is done on the basis of marks secured in the previous qualifying examination.

Mrinalini Dutta Mahavidyalaya, Kolkata, also known as MDM Kolkata, is a popular co-educational degree college. The college offers various courses in Arts, Science, and Commerce. Admission to which is merit-based. Applicants may apply both online as well as offline for the admission process.

College_Name: Milli Al-Ameen College for Girls, Kolkata

College_Summary: Muralidhar Girl's College, Kolkata has been imparting quality education with a mission to enhance educational facilities for women. The college importunes on elemental human values and strives to inculcate these in the students. The Institute provides an environment to students that challenges them into discovering their talent and skills and they are inspired by a culture of creativity. Empowerment of Women is the utmost goal of the college, and with the help of  well-constructed curriculum and contemporaneous academic methodology, the College has been assisting them to enlightened themselves and flourish as an amenable citizen.

Nabadwip Vidyasagar College (NVC) offers undergraduate courses in Arts, Commerce and Science and postgraduate courses in Arts with admission criteria based on merits obtained by the student in the qualifying exam. Application process for the same is online. Students must visit the official website to apply for admission at NVC. Students pursuing various courses at the college may avail scholarships such as ‘Merit cum Means Scholarship’ and ‘Swami Vivekananda Scholarship’.

Nabagram Hiralal Paul College was founded in 1957. It is one of the oldest colleges in West Bengal, it is also known as Konnagar College. The college offers undergraduate in Arts, Commerce, Science, Environmental Studies, and Vocational Studies and postgraduate courses in Bengali. Major courses offered are BA, B.Com, B.Sc, BA (Hons), B.Sc (Hons), B.Com (Hons), B.Voc, and MA. Admission to all the courses is conducted on a Merit basis, and application can be done online.

Narasinha Dutt College is an affiliation of Calcutta University offering various undergraduate courses both general and Hons in 18 subjects across Arts, Science & Commerce as well as 2 self-financed P.G. courses in Mathematics and English. The eligibility criteria for admission are 50% aggregate marks in last qualifying examination. The college admissions process is strictly based on merit with the online application process available on the official website.

College_Name: Nahata Jogendranath Mandal  Smriti Mahavidyalaya, North 24 Parganas
College_Summary: Netaji Nagar Day College is established with a vision to be a leading college in Kolkata by providing a well-resourced strongly academic, holistic education to the students and the mission of the college is to offer equal opportunity of access to all, a differentiate approach to teaching that encourages the students to participate fully in the learning process.

Prasannadeb Women’s College, popularly known as PD Women’s College (PDWC) is the largest women’s college in North Bengal. The college which was established in 1950 offers an undergraduate degree in various disciplines of arts and science.

Pakuahat Degree College, established in 1997, is located in the Malda district of West Bengal. It offers mainly undergraduate courses in arts in both general and honors stream. Admissions are merit-based and on a first come first serve basis. With its wide campus acres, it provides all the facilities for the overall development of students like hostel, library, sports, etc.

College_Name: Padmaja Naidu College of Music, Bardhaman
College_Summary: Panchakot Mahavidyalaya established in 2000 is a general degree college situated in the backdrop of quaint Panchet Pahar of Purulia, West Bengal. The public institute came into existence through crowdfunding and provides degrees in Arts, Science, and Commerce. The institute offers both general and Hons BA, B.Sc, and B.Com courses in various subjects. Admissions in the college are strictly based on merit and the entire procedure is done online.

Panchmura Mahavidyalaya is a private college established in 1965. It is located in Bankura district of West Bengal and is affiliated to the Bankura University. The college is accredited with B+ grade by NAAC. Presently, it offers undergraduate courses in the field of Arts, Science & Commerce. The college has highly qualified faculties and excellent infrastructural facilities

Pandaveswar College, Bardhaman was established in 2005. It is affiliated to Kazi Nazrul University, Asansol. The University of Burdwan granted affiliation to the college and it also got affiliation by the U.G.C. in 2012.

Panihati Mahavidyalaya established in the year 1976 and is affiliated to West Bengal State University. The college offers Under Graduate courses in arts, commerce and science streams. It is an Under Graduate degree college which is accredited by NAAC. The college was funded by the Government of West Bengal, UGC grant, and student fees. Admission is provided to students from different economic and social backgrounds. Selection of the students is done on the basis of marks secured in the previous qualifying examinations.

Panskura Banamali College is a government aided institute which has affiliation from Vidyasagar University, West Bengal. To provide quality education to the students the college has established numerous departments offering courses in Arts, Commerce and Science. The institute is accredited with grade ‘A’ by NAAC. Recently the status of college has been upgraded from a Bachelor’s degree college to Ph.D Degree College By UGC.

Established in 1926, Prabhat Kumar College is one of the oldest colleges in India. It has been recently re-accredited in 2014 by Nationals Assessment & Accreditation Council (NAAC) of University Grants Commission (UGC). This college is located in Midnapore, West Bengal.

Prafulla Chandra College, Kolkata was established in 1954. The college is affiliated to the University of Calcutta. It was recognized by the University Grants commission in 1961, Accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council in 2007 with Grade 'B'.

Purash Kanpur Haridas Nandi Mahavidyalaya is a private institution, established in 1966 and located in Howrah, West Bengal. It is one of the oldest rural general degree colleges in Howrah district affiliated to the University of Calcutta. The college has been accredited with Grade B+ by NAAC. The institute is recognized by University Grant Commission (UGC).

College_Name: Purash Kanpur Haridas Nandi Mahavidyalaya, Howrah
College_Summary: Rampurhat College Birbhum, established in 1950, is affiliated with the University of Burdwan. The college is located in the Burdwan district of West Bengal and offers Undergraduate courses and postgraduate courses in arts, science, and commerce. Admissions are merit-based and offered on a first come first serve basis.

Ranaghat College in Nadia, West Bengal is a NAAC accredited college offering programs in the streams of Arts, Science, and Commerce to students. The courses offered at the college are BA, B.Com, and B.Sc. Admission to which is merit-based. Interested applicants are required to apply online on the official website by paying the registration fee of INR 80. The course fee of the college ranges between INR 3,000-INR 5,000 for the whole program.

Raniganj Girls College was established in 1980 to address a key social issue around the education of girls and women. It runs UG courses with honors in 23 subjects from Arts, Performing Arts, Science and Commerce; along with PG courses in Urdu and program courses in 27 subjects. The college campus spans across seven acres at Searsole.

Rishi Bankim Chandra Evening College (established: 1947, Ownership: Private) named after the celebrated litterateur Rishi Bankim Chandra Chattopadhyaya and situated close to his birthplace, is a government-aided honors college providing higher education to various students coming majorly from the North 24 Parangas, Hooghly and Nadia districts.

Sabang Sajani Kanta Mahavidyalaya was established in 1970 and has been growing ever since its inception. The College offers 18 UG programs across three streams: Arts, Commerce, and Science under 3 degrees like B.A., B.Sc., BCom. It has been planning to launch various PG programs as well. The institution is affiliated with Vidyasagar University, Midnapore and is accredited by NAAC with a B+ grade. The college is adapting to modern technology and installed various audio-visual systems to enhance their teaching practices and for the facilitation of its students.

College_Name: Rishi Bankim Chandra Evening College, North 24 Parganas, West Bengal
College_Summary: Sаldihа College is lосаted in West Bengal. It is the general degree соllege in Bankura district, which is affiliated to Bankura University. Sаldihа College has been re-accredited with B+ grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NААС). The institution has а high reputation for academic excellence, а pleasant environment, and а unique natural environment for promoting excellent learning experience.

College_Name: Sunil Dhar Memorial B.P.Ed. College, Murshidabad
College_Summary: Salesian College is an educational institution run by the Salesians of Don Bosco, Kolkata, and affiliated to the North Bengal University (NBU). It was established initially in 1993 in Shillong and later moved to Darjeeling in 1938. The second Siliguri campus of the college was established in 2009. It has been named as a “College with Potential for Excellence” by the University Grants Commission (UGC). The college offers numerous UG courses, professional courses, and a PG course. Admission to all courses is based on merit in the qualifying examination.

Established in 1996, Sammilani Mahavidyalaya is a public institute affiliated to Calcutta University. The college stands on an urban land area amidst the metropolitan city of Kolkata. Sammilani Mahavidyalaya provides undergraduate courses across Arts, Science and Commerce streams. It is is recognized by UGC also re-accredited with grade ‘B++’ NAAC. Admission process is online and merit based. The college offers reservation of seats as well on the basis of Reservation Criteria made by the Government of India.

Samsi College, established in 1968, is accredited with NAAC “B" Grade. The institute is offering a pleasant atmosphere in its modern campus with up to date faculties and facilities for students. The college offers undergraduate programs under various specializations. Admission is done on the basis of marks scored in the previous qualifying examination. The application forms are filled online on the official website of the college for all the courses.
Ramakrishna Vivekananda Mission Sarada Ma Girls College was established in 2006 at Barasat, Kolkata.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Master of Science [M.Sc] (Food Science and Nutrition)

College_Summary: Savitri Girls’ College is a women’s college located in Kolkata, West Bengal, and it provides Commerce and Arts programs to empower women from financially weaker backgrounds. Established in 1972, the institute is affiliated to the University of Calcutta and is also recognized by U.G.C. Furthermore, the college has also been given an NAAC accreditation with a grade B.

College_Name: Ramakrishna Vivekananda Mission Sarada Ma Girls College, Kolkata
College_Summary: Seth Anandaram Jaipuria College is a reputable college located in North Kolkata. The college possesses a special edge in providing quality-based education and learning to students from all sections of the society. The institution has developed into a premiere institution of knowledge and learning over the years. The staff members, teachers and students at this college are completely dedicated towards serving the society both socially and academically.

College_Name: Seth Soorajmull Jalan Girls College - [S.S.J.G.C], Kolkata

College_Summary: Sir Gurudas Mahavidyalaya, is located in Kolkata and is affiliated by the University of Calcutta. The college offers 13 undergraduate courses in science, arts and commerce along with 2 B.A and 4 M.A. courses which are offered in distance Mode. Admission in all programs is done using an online counselling process. Candidates are selected strictly on the basis of the marks obtained in the qualifying examination.

Sitalkuchi College is an Arts College which was established in 1999. It was established with the purpose of educating students from the remote areas and to empower them further by providing job offers after the completion of the course. The campus is estimated in an area of about 3.33 acres of land. The college only offers an undergraduate program in the field of Arts. Students can easily get admission in the college through the merit scored in the previous qualifying examination.

Sitananda College, Medinipur was established in 1960. It is a public college. It is approved by UGC and affiliated to Vidyasagar University. The college offers B.A, B.A (Hons), B.Sc, B.Sc (Hons) at UG level and MA at PG level. Admission to the college is on merit basis. Candidates seeking admission can apply in online mode.

Sonamukhi College, located in Bankura, imparts three-year Undergraduate Honours and General Courses in three streams (Arts, Science, and Commerce), over 17 courses are offered under these. The degrees provided by the college are B.Com., B.A., and B.Sc. Admission to these courses is solely on the basis of merits obtained in 10+2 in relevant stream. The college campus has facilities such as Auditorium, Computer Lab, Class Rooms, Sports, Grounds, Seminar Hall, and Library.

Sonarpur Mahavidyalaya, West Bengal affiliated with University of Calcutta offers various undergraduate programs under the departments of Science, Arts, Music, and Commerce. The college is recognized by UGC and has accreditation from the NAAC.

The South Calcutta Girls College is a well-known and reputed girl’s college in West Bengal, established in September 1932. This college provides a student-friendly environment and is equipped with various facilities. This college has been accredited with a B++ grade by NAAC and is affiliated with Calcutta University for conducting IA and BA (pass) courses. Presently, it offers fourteen disciplinary courses with Honors degrees in ten departments at the undergraduate and postgraduate levels.

South Malda College is situated in West Bengal in the city of Malda. It is accredited by the NAAC, UGC, and is affiliated to the University of Gour Banga. The institute offers contemporary education to its students majorly at the undergraduate level. It offers undergraduate programs in the field of Arts and Commerce.Any student who has passed 10+2 in any stream is eligible for these courses. The selection is purely on the basis of merit scored in the previous qualifying examination.

Sovarani Memorial college is located in Jagatballavpur, Howrah in the state of West Bengal. The institute was established in 1971. The college is affiliated with the University of Calcutta and it is also accredited by the NAAC. It is also approved by the University Grants Commission (UGC). The institute offers B.A, B.Sc, and B.Com courses with both General and Honours courses. Admission procedures for all the courses are strictly based on merit. Candidates can apply for admission to the college by filling the application form online.

Sree Chaitanya College is a co-education college established in 1965 at North 24 Parganas, West Bengal. It aims to cater to the requirements of students belonging to the economically weaker and underprivileged section of the society. The college is affiliated to West Bengal State University and has been approved by UGC. Presently it offers B.A. (Hons), BA (General), B.Com, B.Sc. at the Undergraduate level and M.Com at the Postgraduate level. Admissions to the college are granted on the basis of merit.

Sree Gopal Banerjee College [SGBC] is located in Hooghly, West Bengal. It was established in 1958. The college started functioning on 21st July, 1958. It was later shifted to the current three-storeyed structure on 24th April, 1959. The college has now developed into one of the biggest institutions under the University of Burdwan. The college works on 3 different shifts(Morning, Day and Night).

Srikrishna College, Nadia was established in 1952. It is affiliated to University of Kalyani and approved by University Grants Commission (UGC). The college offers undergraduate programs in the fields of arts, science and commerce. It is a study centre for the Open and Distance Learning of the University of Kalyani. The college has career counselling cell to guide the out-going students.

Sukumar Sengupta Mahavidyalaya was established in the year 2004. The college is located in Keshpur, Paschim Medinipur District. It is affiliated to Vidyasagar University.  The college offers undergraduate courses in the field of Arts and Science. Admission to this college is a purely merit basis. The college has highly-qualified faculties in every department and includes all the necessary facilities for students.

College_Name: St Paul's Cathedral Mission College, Kolkata
College_Summary: Surendranath College was established in 1972 by the University Grant Commission. The campus is affiliated with the University of Calcutta. Seminar rooms, a conference hall, and a digital library with many books are available at Surendranath College. Moreover, the college provides various courses in arts, science, and commerce. The main programs offered by the college are BA(H) in History, English, Bengali, psychology, chemistry, etc. The campus is NAAC accredited with a B++ grade. The college takes admission on a merit basis. Around 165 faculty are there in the college. The college promotes scholarships and concessions for economic background candidates.

Established in 1948, Surendranath College for Women is a government institution recognized by the University Grants Council. The college, affiliated to the University of Calcutta, has been accredited with a B++ grade by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council. Surendranath College for Women offers undergraduate courses in arts, science, and commerce streams. The admission procedure is conducted online, while the selection process is based on previous qualifying examinations merit. The career counseling cell on the campus keeps students updated on various job opportunities. The college has a NAAC accreditation of B++ with a CGPA of 2.78.

College_Name: Sundarban Hazi Desarat College, South 24 Parganas
College_Summary: Surendranath Evening College, Kolkata was established in 1961. The College is affiliated with the University of Calcutta and has been accredited by NAAC. The College offers B.Sc, B.Com, BA, B.Com (Hons), BA (Hons), etc and admissions are purely based on merit. It follows a credit-based curriculum.

Syamsundar College, West Bengal, established in 1948, is an Arts and Science college offering various Undergraduate courses such as BA, B.Sc, and B.Com courses in both regular and honors degrees. The interested students may apply to the college online through the official website. Admissions at the college are based on merits obtained in 10+2. The minimum marks required to be eligible for admission is 50% aggregate marks in the last qualifying examination.

Taki Government College is very focused towards becoming the center of excellence. They give the best learning to their students.  This college is located at the Bank of the river Ichhamati. It is also considered as one of the best and remarkable institutions of West Bengal and gives higher education. This is a college that has and will always inspire the new generations to grab the knowledge through the ambience of the college. They are also very much into the curricular, co-curricular and extra-curricular activities.  The teachers here prepare their students for the future competition. They try to identify the talent of every student and prophet them in that field. This is one of the best things about this college. Every department here has their separate reading books that are very beneficial for the students as well as for the teachers.

Established in the year 1948, The Tamralipta Mahavidyalaya is one of the esteemed universities that is affiliated to the Vidyasagar group of universities. Tamralipta Mahavidyalaya is situated in Tamluk in the West Bengal state of India. It is accredited by AICTE and is affiliated with the University of Calcutta, Kolkata.

Tarakeswar Degree College aims at providing best in class career-oriented teaching for the students due to the skilled faculty of the college. It gives golden opportunities to every student with a fair means of communication. It was established to spread higher education among students. It has been the nerve center for intellectual, academic and cultural pursuits in the region. The students are coming to this college hail from families with the agricultural background. There are even first-generation learners, and it is a challenge to impart knowledge to them. The college aims to provide quality sustenance, quality awareness, and quality assurance to the students.

Bhawanipur Education Society College is a private, co-educational institute established in the year 1966. The college was built by the efforts and donation of money and land by Guajarati Community living in Kolkata. It is accredited by NAAC and affiliated to the University of Calcutta.
January 11, 2021: Commencement of online BFA classes from January 12, 2021

College_Name: Thakur Panchanan Mahila Mahavidyalaya, Cooch Behar
College_Summary: Tufanganj Mahavidyalaya was inaugurated in the year 1971 by the District Magistrate of Cooch, Behar and it was affiliated to the University of North Bengal. It offers undergraduate courses in Arts, Science, and Commerce. College campus is facilitated with an Auditorium, Computer Lab, Library, Medical facilities, Hostel, and other facilities. It is spread over nearly 18.5 acres of land. It is accredited to NAAC and has a grade of B+.

College_Name: The Indian College of Arts and Draftsmanship, Kolkata
College_Summary: Uluberia College, Howrah, West Bengal, was set up in the year 1948. It is affiliated to the University of Calcutta and NAAC has accredited this college with B grade. Presently, the college is running undergraduate courses in the field of Arts, Science, and Commerce along with B.Ed. program. Apart from these, the college also offers postgraduate courses like MA and M.Sc. across various streams through distance mode. The college aims at making individuals not only academically sound but also morally good.

College_Name: The Ramakrishna Mission Institute of Culture, Kolkata
College_Summary: University B.T and Evening College is a prestigious college established in the year 1968 at Cooch Behar, West Bengal. It is affiliated to the University of North Bengal. The college offers B.A. (Hons), B.A, B.Sc. (Hons), B. Com, B.Com. (Hons), and B.Ed. programs at the UG level and also offers MA (Distance Education) at the PG level. Admissions are based on the merit in the last qualifying exams. The college aims at providing all-round development to its students and advance in the best way possible.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Counselling Psychology

College_Name: Turku Hansda Lapsa Hemram Mahavidyalay- [THLH], Birbhum
College_Summary: Vivekananda College For Women, situated in Kolkata is affiliated with the University of Calcutta, Kolkata. The college offers 25 courses across 5 streams namely, Arts, Education, Science, Commerce and Banking, Performing Arts. The 25 courses are offered at the UG and PG level. Students may also enrol themselves for M. Phil and Ph. D programs that encourage work on research projects under the mentorship of PhD-qualified guides. Admission to the college is mainly merit-based except for the MA program. The 40% MA seats are filled in by the students qualifying for the college entrance exam.

Vivekananda Mahavidyalaya, a college named after Swami Vivekananda was established in Burdwan town of West Bengal. The institute offers mostly UG courses in the Arts and Science domain along with one PG course in Chemistry. The Undergraduate courses include B.A. (General), B.Sc. (General), B.A.(Honours), B.Sc.(Honours). Admission to all these courses are done in online mode and are strictly based on merits obtained by the student in the qualifying exams. While applying for the admission, the applicants are required to pay the registration fees of INR 250 through Net banking, Credit card or Debit card.

College_Name: University BT & Evening College, Cooch Behar
Vidyasagar School of Social Works - [VSSW], Kolkata
College_Summary: Established in 1937, Women’s College, Kolkata has been one of the popular Women’s Colleges under University of Calcutta. Women’s College provides both Undergraduate and Postgraduate Degree programs. In the UG program, both General and Honors streams are offered.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Peace and Christian Studies

College_Name: National Institute of Film and Fine Arts - [NIFFA], Kolkata

College_Summary: Vivekananda Mahavidyalaya is situated in Hooghly, West Bengal. It started its journey in 1966 and is affiliated to the University of Burdwan. The mission of the institution is ‘Atmanam Vidhi’, i.e., ‘Know thyself’.

Established in 1948, Calcutta National Medical College is a state government medical institute located in Kolkata which offers 5 courses with almost 30 specialisations in preclinical, paraclinical and clinical divisions. It offers undergraduate, post graduate and postdoctoral courses such as MBBS, M.Ch, DM, MD and MS. In addition to this, the college also offers Nursing and diploma courses for their students.

College_Summary: Institute of Hotel & Restaurant Management is a renowned Private college located in the Indian city of Kolkata. It was established 30 years back in 1994 and offers Undergraduate courses in Business Administration, Hotel Management, Computer Applications, and Hospitality & Hotel Administration, etc. The college is approved by the National Council for Hotel Management and Catering Technology, and affiliated with Maulana Abdul Kalam Azad University of Technology - West Bengal.

College_Name: Haldia Institute of Dental Sciences and Research, Medinipur
College_Summary: Institute of Advanced Management, Kolkata is the oldest professional hospitality institute in the country established in 1989 and is also one of the first to be approved by AICTE. In 1995, IAM became the first Indian Institute to be validated to deliver a degree level programme of any British University. The college also offers undergraduate and diploma courses in the field of Hospitality Management. The university has an association with the University of West London.

The institute offers placement in National and International organizations with highest package in the industry.

College_Name: Elitte Hotel School (The Hospitality Institute), Kolkata

College_Name: Institute of Hotel & Restaurant Management, Kolkata, West Bengal
College_Summary: Subhas Bose Institute of Hotel Management (SBIHM), Kolkata offers numerous quality centralized modern-day courses at UG, PG, and Diploma levels in the desired hotel management and related trades. Admission to these courses is done on the basis of entrance test conducted at the institute level.

College_Summary: Haldia Law College was established in 2002. It is in affiliation with Vidyasagar University and approved by the Bar Council of India. Admission to the college is merit-based with some minimum eligibility criteria. The application process is both offline and online. Scholarships are also provided to students with minority backgrounds.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}

College_Summary: Hooghly Mohsin College, Chinsurah, Hooghly is one of the prestigious and heritage institutions in India catering to the needs of higher education in West Bengal. The College has produced a galaxy of students in various fields since its inception glorifying the name of the institution in all over the globe.

College_Name: Bikash Bharati Law College, South 24 Parganas
College_Summary: Jalpaiguri Law College situated in West Bengal was set up in 1981. It offers degree courses in Law stream and is approved by Bar Council of India. This college is affiliated to the University of North Bengal and is the only government-funded college in the residing district, which is solely dedicated to imparting knowledge of the law. This college offers Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Legislative Law (BA LLB) General and Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Legislative Law (BA LLB) Honours at the undergraduate level and a five-year full-time Integrated program in Law as approved by the Bar Council of India and affiliation to the University of North Bengal.

Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [BALLB] {Hons.}

College_Name: Durgapur Institute of Legal Studies, Bardhaman
College_Summary: Kingston Law College (KLC), Kolkata is a privately owned legal institution established in 2004. KLC is the 2nd Law college to be established in West Bengal and the Largest Private College in West Bengal Seat Capacity. It is a part of the Kingston Educational Institute, situated in Barasat, West Bengal. The college is recognized by the BCI and owes its affiliation to the West Bengal State University. It offers 5 law courses namely BBA-LLB, BA-LLB (Hons.), BA-LLB, LLB and LLM under the guidance of highly qualified faculty members. The college boasts of a sprawling campus with lush greenery spreaded over 28 acres of land with state-of-the-art infrastructure and facilities. In addition to this, KLC has ensured 100% placement for all its students in the coming academic year. More than 300 recruiters visited KLC Kolkata for on-campus recruitment and a total of 15,000 students got placed in well-reputed law firms. Some of the major recruiters from the college include Somani Realtors, Kshetri Associates, Bajaj Finance, etc.

College_Summary: Rabindra Shiksha Sammillani Law College is a reputed self-financed Law college located in Pargana district, Kolkata, West Bengal. The charitable society of West Bengal, Rabindra Shiksha Sammilani Samiti has established the college in 2008. It is approved by the Bar Council of India (BCI) and is affiliated to Calcutta University.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Name: Indian Institute of Legal Studies - [IILS], Darjeeling
College_Summary: Sarsuna Law College is a prestigious law college established in the year 2004 at Sarsuna, Kolkata. It is affiliated to Vidyasagar University, West Bengal, and has been approved by BCI. The college offers LL.B. and LLM programs that are designed to prepare future lawyer professionals. Admission to both programs is granted on the basis of merit. The college is dedicated to providing quality law education with highly qualified & knowledgeable faculties.

College_Name: Snehangshu Kanta Acharya Institute of Law - [SKAIL], Nadia
College_Summary: NIPER Kolkata, also popular with the name National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research, is a pharmaceutical institute in Kolkata established under the aegis of the Ministry of Chemicals & Fertilizer. The college was established in 2007 to provide advanced degrees and research opportunities in the pharmaceutical sciences. UGC has designated this university as an "Institute of National Importance."

College_Name: Bengal College of Pharmaceutical Science and Research - [BCPSR], Durgapur
College_Summary: Bankura Sammilani Medical College, Bankura, West Bengal was established in 1956. The college offers 7 courses across 1 stream namely GNM, MS, MD, MSc, BSc, and Paramedical Courses. Application Form can be filled through online mode. Admission can be taken through the NEET entrance exam.

College_Summary: Established in 2004, Midnapore Medical College & Hospital or MMC, earlier known as Midnapur Sadar Hospital, imparts medical courses and has been ranked 9th among other medical colleges in Kolkata.

Nil Ratan Sircar Medical College and Hospital (NRSMC) is a government medical college established in the year 1873 in Kolkata, West Bengal. It was renamed in the year 1950 after a Social activist, a Freedom Fighter, and an Alumnus of this institution in Kolkata, Sir Nilratan Sircar. The college is a public institution and is affiliated with the West Bengal University of Health Sciences. It is approved by NMC.

North Bengal Medical College and Hospital, Darjeeling, popularly known as NBMC Darjeeling, is one of the first and biggest prominent medical colleges in the North Bengal Region. The college was established in 1968 and is recognized by the Medical Council of India and is affiliated with the West Bengal University of Health Sciences (WBUHS).

College_Summary: The college started its journey in 2002. It puts both quality and quantity supported by our well qualified faculty. The college is fully geared with new enthusiasm and is ready to meet new challenges of life and demand of professors by gradually reducing the gap between the demand and supply. The vision of the college is to play a vital role in shaping the life of the students and to spread knowledge to improve their skills through the expertise of modern education. The college is recognized by Government of West Bengal and is affiliated to West Bengal University of Health Sciences (WBUHS), West Bengal University of Technology (WBUT), Vidyasagar University (Midnapore). The college is also recognized by Rehabilitation Council of India (RCI) and Indian Association of Physiotherapists (IAP).

Bose Institute, Kolkata is an autonomous research institution established in 1917, by Sir J.C Bose, the founder of modern science in Indian Subcontinent. Being Asia’s first research centre devoted to interdisciplinary research, the institute offers Ph.D. programs in various interdisciplinary specializations. Moreover, the institute has also an integrated M.Sc. – Ph.D. program, admission to which is based on entrance exam scores.

Durgapur Institute of Advanced Technology & Management was established in the year 2002. College has dedicated and qualified faculty members who only restricted themselves to quality teaching with regular class test and projects. College is affiliated to West Bengal University of Technology and is approved by AICTE.

College_Name: BM Birla College of Nursing, Kolkata
School of Nursing Ruby General Hospital College - [SNRCH], Kolkata

College_Summary: Technique Polytechnic Institute is a private college established in 2008. The Institute was approved by AICTE and NBA. Technique Polytechnic Institute is known for its flagship Diploma in Engineering courses. Diploma Candidates are offered admission based on TAT-2021/ JEXPO score followed by counselling process. Further, the Institute is planning to conduct the TAT 2021 July 24, 2021.

College_Name: Durgapur Institute of Advanced Technology & Management - [DIATM], Durgapur

College_Summary: City College of Commerce and Business Administration, shortly referred to as CCCBA, was established as a college in 1881 in Kolkata, West Bengal. CCCBA  currently offers only the Bachelor of Commerce course (general and honors). B.A. classes were introduced in 1884; a Law Department came up in 1885, and M.A. classes were introduced and conducted until the new regulations of Calcutta University terminated them. Admissions to both courses are on the basis of merit in the 12th standard examination. There is no entrance examination required.

College_Name: Institute of Radio Physics and Electronics - [IRPE], Kolkata
College_Summary: Siliguri College of Commerce is popularly known for offering a B.Com (Hons.) course followed by its Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA). Admission to these courses is done on the basis of marks secured by the candidates in their qualifying examination. The B.Com (Hons.) course is offered in two specializations namely Management and Accountancy. Candidates need to secure a minimum of 55% aggregate marks in 10+2 to apply for this course.

Acharya Prafulla Chandra Roy Government College (APCRGC) is a Government degree college established in the year 2010. It is affiliated to the University of North Bengal and is accredited by NAAC with A grade. The college offers undergraduate courses in the field of Arts, Science, Commerce & Business Administration. It has modern infrastructural facilities and well-qualified faculties to help the aspirants in achieving their goals.

College_Name: Ananda Chandra College of Commerce, Jalpaiguri
College_Summary: Calcutta Girls' College is a higher learning institution for women, situated in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. The main courses offered are BA, B.Sc, and B.Com. Admission is granted according to merit achieved in class XII. The admissions to the BA program requires 50% aggregate marks in 10+2 in any stream. The B.Sc course program required 50% marks in the science stream and for the B.Com program, the students must have obtained 45-50% marks in 10+2 with commerce stream. The fee structure of UG courses at Calcutta Girls College ranges between INR 3000 to INR 3500 per year.

College_Name: City College of Commerce and Business Administration

College_Summary: Army Institute Of Management, Kolkata (AIMK) has been placed in the ‘A+++’ category in the B-School Survey by Business India. The institute has been accredited by NAAC for the state-of-the-art management program. It has completed 20 years of its existence and ranked among the best B-School in the country. It offers a 2-years full-time MBA program to prepare students for the business world. Admission to the same is done through a highly competitive entrance test namely CAT.

College_Name: National institute of Biomedical Genomics - [NIBMG], Kalyani
Advanced Institute of Modern Management and Technology - [AIMMT], Kolkata

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Education Management [PGDEd.M]

College_Name: Chandannagar Institute of Management & Technology - [CIMT], Hooghly
Durgapur Institute of Management and Science - [DIMS], Durgapur
College_Summary: Adamas Institute of Teacher Education is runs by Sachis Kiron Roy Medical Trust. It is a institute which provides education to students and nation by its teachers. Its mission is to provide high quality education to students for teacher education. It offers bachelor of education and master of education courses. Its campus has a spacious building and it has a well-designed library with huge collection of books.  The institute having experienced and well qualified faculties.

Acharya Ramendra Sundar Primary Teacher's Training Institute - [ARSPTTI], Birbhum
Adamas Institute of Teacher Education, North 24 Parganas
Agragati Primary Teachers' Training Institute, Howrah
College_Summary: Enterprise Development Institute (EDI), Kolkata is promoted By Bengal National Chamber of Commerce & Industry (BNCCI) with support from Govt. of West Bengal and Govt. of India. The institute has been conducting vocational, entrepreneurship, management and skill development and courses for various target groups.

College_Summary: Falakata College was founded on September 19th, 1981. Since then, it has remained one of the most important colleges in North Bengal, both in terms of education and sports. It offers both BA Hons and general programs in various specializations. Admission is made strictly based on merit and as per procedure laid down by the Admission Committee of the college. Students passing H.S. (10+2) Examination from WBCHSE or other Recognised Boards Provided he/she has passed with at least Four subjects with English as a Compulsory subject, excluding Environmental studies/Science/Education are eligible to get application forms from the college website.

Gobindapur Sephali Memorial Primary Teacher's Training Institute, Bardhaman

College_Summary: Institute of Mass Communication Film and Television Studies (IMCFTS), Kolkata is an institution that focuses on various disciplines under media studies. IMCFTS offers various courses such as B.A. (Hons), M.A and PG Diploma courses in the discipline of Media Studies, Mass Communication and Journalism & Film and Television Studies and many more.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts [BA] {Hons.} (Journalism and Mass Communication)

College_Name: Hetampur Rajbati Primary Teachers Training Institute, Birbhum
College_Summary: Jiaganj Institute Of Education And Training (JIET), Murshidabad is a self-financed Institute, established in 2009 under the supervision of Jiaganj Education and Welfare Society with the recognition of NCTE. JIET offers B.Ed and D.El.Ed courses in its curriculum. The admission to the same is done on the basis of merit.

College_Name: Hope Institute of Bengal (B.Ed Section), Howrah
Institute of Educational Research & Studies Ptti College, Kolkata
Institute of Mass Communication Film and Television Studies
College_Summary: Krishnanagar B.Ed. College, is a self financed institute established in 2005. It is located in Nadia district of West Bengal. The college is affiliated with University of Kalyani and recognized by National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE). Currently, the college offers only a single B.Ed course.

College_Name: Jiaganj Institute of Education and Training - [JIET], Murshidabad
College_Summary: Majhihira Ashram Primary Teachers Training Institute (MAPTTI), Purulia was established in 1940 by a group of Gandhian freedom fighters, with an objective of spreading Basic Education (Nai Talim) as enunciated by Mahatma Gandhi in 1937. It offers Diploma in Elementary Education. Admission to MAPTTI depends on the performance of the candidates in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the institute are highly qualified and well experienced. Check: MAPTTI Purulia Courses & Fees
